author: wrowe
msg: Updated APR to pass the thread worker_function prototype
(apr_thread_start_t) two parameters, the apr private data
Applications' worker_thread() routines may use apr_thread_pool_get
to access the pool (implemented using APR_POOL_*_ACCESSOR() macros.)

author: wrowe
msg: These both need to be apr_pool_child_cleanup_set() ... we are simply
toggling between the null cleanup and a real cleanup.
